alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Steuben, eastern Noble, Whitley, northwestern De Kalb and southeastern Lagrange Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Churubusco, or near Tri-lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia City, Tri-lakes and Churubusco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley
